thread.title: US to settle with Chinese phone maker ZTE for $1 billion over Iran sales
thread.title_full: US to settle with Chinese phone maker ZTE for $1 billion over Iran sales

title: US to settle with Chinese phone maker ZTE for $1 billion over Iran sales
text:
CNBC.com SHARES 
Chinese cellphone maker ZTE has agreed to a $1 billion settlement with the United States over allegedly running afoul of American sanctions on technology sales to Iran, a source familiar with the matter told CNBC on Tuesday. 
The Commerce and Justice Departments are expected to announce the settlement later Tuesday.
